Package com.example.foodfight

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    acAddCustomFood
    acAddFood class control the activity_add_food.xml, its elements and objects, and updating it with data and information as the user interacts with it.
    acAddFood
    acAddFood class controls the activity_add_food.xml, its elements and objects, and updating it with data and information as the user interacts with it.
    acAppAbout
    acAppAbout class activity is a fixed screen showing some information about the team and the app.
    acCalendar
    acCalendar class provides selection of day (within a Â±1 year constraint) for use by acMeal activity (and subsequent activities) as part of the index for retrieving meal content from the database.
    acFoodItem
    acFoodItem class use retrieved food data (food name, calories, serving size, serving unit, and brand name) from database and other acMeal class to update activity_food_item.xml
    acFoodList
    acFoodList class interact with the database to display on activity_food_list.xml a list of foods added by user.
    acMeals
    acMeals class displays (on activity_meals.xml) the meals that can be reviewed or edited by the user.
    acTrend
    acTrend class is part of the stretch goal where calorie trends are graphically displayed.
    acUserProfile
    Collects user's specifics for BMI calculation and calorie goal settings.
    Api
    Api class interfaces with nutritionix API to search for food data and returns a map of json food objects and values via NutriApiEngine function.
    ApiHandler
    ApiHandler class manages food map from Api class so that food name, manufacturer, calories, serving unit, and serving size are retrieved from the map for use in other activities.
    CalendarHandler
    Tom 8Jun21: This is to handle calling up date objects to the TODO is this going to be in the Presenter or Model layer? Caleb 8Jun21: CALENDAR HANDLER CalendarHandler class encapsulate the day, month, year, and date values from acCalendar activity.
    DatabaseHandler
    TODO: hardcode 2-3 foods, all meals for one date June 30
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FoodItem
    FoodItem class holds the information for the food item that is added to the meal.
    FoodLibraryCreator
    This was going to prepopulate our foodLibrary, but this was abandonded in the last week due to time constraints.
    FoodSearchThreadCreator
    This helped us to return data back to the acFoodList screen.
    Goals  
    MainActivity
    The main activity screen shows progress bars for daily and weekly calorie counts against user goals.
    MealItem
